text.div:
VhDir EHR Attestation Method

This value set includes a codes that describe the relationship between the list of standards defining digital certificates.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
    CodeDisplay
    ownerIndicate the element or resource was ownerIndicates the element or resource was attested to by the individual who owned the data.
    authrepAuthorized representativeIndicates the element or resource was attested to by an individual who was designated to attest by the owner the data.
    authintAuthorized intermediary, eg CA DirectoryIndicates the element or resource was attested to by a system that was designated to attest by the owners the data it collects.
    non-auth-srcNon-authorized sourceIndicates the element or resource was attested to by an individual or system that was not deignated to attest by the owner of the data.

name: VhDir EHR Attestation Method
description: This value set includes a codes that describe the relationship between the list of standards defining digital certificates.

contains.display: Indicate the element or resource was owner
